text: Rita Renoir (19 January 1934 - 4 May 2016) was a French striptease entertainer and actress. She was born in Paris. She was one of the most famous European strip-teasers. In 1964, Renoir was chosen by Michelangelo Antonioni to play the role of Emilia in The Red Desert Renoir died on 4 May 2016 at the age of 82.Mort de Rita Renoir, comédienne et célèbre strip-teaseuse ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jean-Michel Palmier, « Rita Renoir : Les Voyeurs attrapés par la queue », in Politique Hebdo. title: Rita Renoir
